products.name: Waterproof Mascara
products.description: Professional waterproof mascara with luxurious gold packaging. Delivers dramatic volume and length that lasts all day without smudging or flaking.
products.ingredients: Aqua, Synthetic Beeswax, Paraffin, Acacia Senegal Gum, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid

products.name: Eyeliner Pencil
products.description: Precision waterproof eyeliner pencil for defining and enhancing your eyes. Smooth application with intense color payoff that stays put all day.
products.ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Synthetic Wax, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polybutene

products.name: 5D Natural Lashes
products.description: Handcrafted 5D natural false eyelashes for a comfortable, soft, and dramatic look. Perfect for special occasions or everyday glamour.
products.ingredients: Premium synthetic fibers, cotton band, hypoallergenic adhesive

products.name: Premium Lip Color
products.description: Rich, creamy lip color with long-lasting formula. Delivers vibrant pigmentation and smooth application for beautiful, kissable lips.
products.ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ozokerite, Synthetic Wax, Tocopherol

products.name: Professional Makeup Brush Set
products.description: Complete professional makeup brush collection for flawless application. Premium synthetic bristles designed for precision and perfect blending.
products.ingredients: Synthetic taklon bristles, aluminum ferrule, wooden handles

products.name: Luxury Foundation
products.description: Full coverage luxury foundation with a natural finish. Provides flawless complexion while nourishing your skin with premium ingredients.
products.ingredients: Aqua, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Titanium Dioxide

products.name: Nail Art Collection
products.description: Professional nail art accessories and decorative elements. Create stunning nail designs with our premium collection of nail art supplies.
products.ingredients: Acrylic polymers, adhesive compounds, decorative materials

products.name: Contour Palette
products.description: Professional contour and highlight palette for sculpting and defining facial features. Includes warm and cool tones for all skin types.
products.ingredients: Talc, Mica, Magnesium Stearate, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol

categories.name: Eyes
categories.description: Eye makeup products including mascara, eyeliner, and eyeshadow

categories.name: Lips
categories.description: Lip products including lipstick, gloss, and lip care

categories.name: Complexion
categories.description: Face makeup including foundation, concealer, and powder

categories.name: Nails
categories.description: Nail care and nail art products

migration_notes.purpose: This file contains the existing DEMILAND product data for backend migration
migration_notes.usage: Use this data to populate your database when setting up the Flask backend
migration_notes.api_integration: The frontend API service is already configured to work with these data structures
migration_notes.real_time_sync: Product changes in admin dashboard will sync with frontend through the productService
next_steps: Import this data into your PostgreSQL database
Set up Flask API endpoints to serve this data
Test real-time synchronization between admin dashboard and frontend
Add product images to your CDN or static file server
